## blockRendering.OutputConnection class

An object containing information about the space an output connection takes up during rendering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class OutputConnection extends Connection 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `OutputConnection` class.
